summary.span: 表示 的參數及其對 資料行的對應 (選擇性)。

span.span: Represents a parameter to a and optionally its mapping to columns.

summary.span: 如需參數的詳細資訊，請參閱[設定參數和參數資料類型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。

span.span: For more information on parameters, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數名稱不區分大小寫。Parameter names are not case sensitive. > [!NOTE] > 沒有名稱，也稱為 序數，不支援參數由.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server。Nameless, also called ordinal, parameters are not supported by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. 如需詳細資訊，以及其他範例程式碼示範如何使用參數，請參閱[命令和參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md)。For more information, along with additional sample code demonstrating how to use parameters, see [Commands and Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個執行個體透過集合內。The following example creates multiple instances of through the collection within the . 從資料來源選取資料並將資料放在使用這些參數。These parameters are used to select data from the data source and put the data in the . 這個範例假設和已經建立使用適當的結構描述、 命令及連線。This example assumes that a and a have already been created by using the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. 如需詳細資訊和使用參數的其他範例，請參閱[擷取和修改 ADO.NET 中的資料](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-and-modifying-data.md)和[設定參數和參數資料型別](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information and additional examples on using parameters, see [Retrieving and Modifying Data in ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-and-modifying-data.md) and [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定中`value`參數，推斷的 Microsoft.NET Framework 型別。When you specify an in the `value` parameter, the is inferred from the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the . 當您使用的這個多載時請特別小心建構函式指定整數參數值。Use caution when you use this overload of the constructor to specify integer parameter values. 由於這個多載接受 型別的 `value`，因此您必須在值為零時將整數值轉換成 型別，如下面的 C# 範例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` Parameter = new SqlParameter("@pname", (object)0); ``` 如果您不會執行這項轉換，則編譯器會假設您嘗試呼叫`SqlParameter`(`string`， `SqlDbType`) 建構函式多載。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the `SqlParameter` (`string`, `SqlDbType`) constructor overload. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 取得或設定值，以表示參數是僅限輸入、僅限輸出、雙向 (Bidirectional) 或預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 傳回值參數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是輸出，以及執行相關聯的沒有傳回值，包含 null 值。If the is output, and execution of the associated does not return a value, the contains a null value. `Output``InputOut`，和`ReturnValue`透過呼叫所傳回的參數無法存取，直到您關閉。`Output`, `InputOut`, and `ReturnValue` parameters returned by calling cannot be accessed until you close the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. MemberSignature.Value: public bool ForceColumnEncryption { get; set; }
.property instance bool ForceColumnEncryption
Public Property ForceColumnEncryption As Boolean
public: property bool ForceColumnEncryption { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 使用 [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) 時，會強制加密參數。

span.span: Enforces encryption of a parameter when using [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

summary.span: 如果 SQL Server 通知驅動程式參數不需要加密，則使用參數的查詢會失敗。

span.span: If SQL Server informs the driver that the parameter does not need to be encrypted, the query using the parameter will fail.

summary.span: 這個屬性會提供額外的保護以對抗安全性攻擊，事關受危害的 SQL Server 提供不正確的加密中繼資料給用戶端，這有可能導致資料洩漏。

span.span: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing incorrect encryption metadata to the client, which may lead to data disclosure.

value.span: 如果參數有強制資料行加密。否則， 。

span.span: if the parameter has a force column encryption; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性的位移。

span.span: Gets or sets the offset to the property.
The offset to the .
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Offset`屬性適用於用戶端區塊處理的二進位和字串資料。The `Offset` property is used for client-side chunking of binary and string data. 比方說，若要插入的伺服器上的資料行中的 10 MB 的文字，使用者可能會執行 10 個參數化的插入的 1 MB 的區塊，移位的值`Offset`上每個反覆項目 1 mb。For example, in order to insert 10MB of text into a column on a server, a user might execute 10 parameterized inserts of 1MB chunks, shifting the value of `Offset` on each iteration by 1MB. `Offset` 指定的二進位型別，位元組數目以及字串的字元數目。`Offset` specifies the number of bytes for binary types, and the number of characters for strings. 字串的計數不包括結束的字元。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#3)]

span.span: This indicates that the data provider sets the precision for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供具有參數的的`Decimal`。The property is used by parameters that have a of `Decimal`. 您不需要指定的值和屬性輸入參數，因為它們可以從參數值推斷。You do not need to specify values for the and properties for input parameters, as they can be inferred from the parameter value. `Precision` 和`Scale`輸出參數以及您要指定不含值，例如特定的有效位數和小數位數指定 null 值，指出參數的完整中繼資料的案例都需要。`Precision` and `Scale` are required for output parameters and for scenarios where you need to specify complete metadata for a parameter without indicating a value, such as specifying a null value with a specific precision and scale. > [!NOTE] > 不支援使用這個屬性，以強制資料傳遞至資料庫。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. Round 截斷，或否則 coerce 資料傳遞至資料庫之前，請使用類別屬於`System`之前指派值給參數的命名空間`Value`屬性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft.NET Framework 資料提供者隨附於.NET Framework 1.0 版不會驗證或的參數值。Microsoft .NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the or of parameter values. 這會造成插入資料來源上的截斷的資料。This can cause truncated data being inserted at the data source. 如果您使用.NET Framework 1.0 版，驗證和的設定參數值之前的值。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the and of values before setting the parameter value. 當您使用.NET Framework 1.1 版或更新版本時，如果將擲回例外狀況參數值會設定具有無效的。When you use .NET Framework version 1.1 or a later version, an exception is thrown if a parameter value is set with an invalid . 值超過參數的小數點位數仍然會被截斷。 values that exceed the parameter scale are still truncated. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行命令時，其中包含參數值、 程式碼可以明確地設定參數的型別或參數可以推斷其類型的值。When executing a command that includes parameter values, code can either set the type of a parameter explicitly, or the parameter can infer its type from its value. 呼叫這個方法，使推斷其類型，從傳入參數中的值時，一次，會重設參數。Calling this method resets the parameter so that it can again infer its type from the value passed in the parameter. 呼叫這個方法會同時影響和屬性。Calling this method affects both the and properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供具有參數的的`Decimal`。The property is used by parameters that have a of `Decimal`. > [!WARNING] > 如果資料可能被截斷屬性未明確指定與伺服器上的資料不適合標尺為 0 （預設值）。Data may be truncated if the property is not explicitly specified and the data on the server does not fit in scale 0 (the default). 您不需要指定的值和屬性輸入參數，因為它們可以從參數值推斷。You do not need to specify values for the and properties for input parameters, as they can be inferred from the parameter value. `Precision` 和`Scale`輸出參數以及您要指定不含值，例如特定的有效位數和小數位數指定 null 值，指出參數的完整中繼資料的案例都需要。`Precision` and `Scale` are required for output parameters and for scenarios where you need to specify complete metadata for a parameter without indicating a value, such as specifying a null value with a specific precision and scale. > [!NOTE] > 不支援使用這個屬性，以強制資料傳遞至資料庫。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. Round 截斷，或否則 coerce 資料傳遞至資料庫之前，請使用類別屬於`System`之前指派值給參數的命名空間`Value`屬性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > 隨附於.NET Framework 1.0 版的.NET framework 資料提供者不會驗證或的參數值。.NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the or of parameter values. 這可能會導致截斷的資料插入到資料來源。This can cause truncated data to be inserted at the data source. 如果您使用.NET Framework 1.0 版，驗證和的設定參數值之前的值。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the and of values before setting the parameter value. 值超過參數的小數點位數仍然會被截斷。 values that exceed the parameter scale are still truncated. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Size { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Size
Public Overrides Property Size As Integer
public: virtual property int Size { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行中資料的最大大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 資料行中資料的最大大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 預設值是由參數值推斷。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性則不會影響傳回值從預存程序傳回參數一律為固定大小的整數。Return values are not affected by this property; return parameters from stored procedures are always fixed-size integers. 變數長度類型 (例如 nvarchar) 的輸出參數，參數的大小定義輸出參數的緩衝區的大小。For output parameters with a variable length type (nvarchar, for example), the size of the parameter defines the size of the buffer holding the output parameter. 輸出參數可以截斷，以指定其大小。The output parameter can be truncated to a size specified with . 使用指定的字元類型大小是以字元為單位。For character types, the size specified with is in characters. 屬性適用於二進位和字串類型。The property is used for binary and string types. 類型參數`SqlType.String`，`Size`表示 Unicode 字元長度。For parameters of type `SqlType.String`, `Size` means length in Unicode characters. 類型參數`SqlType.Xml`，`Size`會被忽略。For parameters of type `SqlType.Xml`, `Size` is ignored. 針對非字串資料類型和 ANSI 字串資料，屬性參考到的位元組數目。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. Unicode 字串資料，指的是字元數。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字串的計數不包括結束的字元。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 可變長度資料類型，說明資料傳輸至伺服器的最大數量。For variable-length data types, describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，針對 Unicode 字串值，無法用來限制傳送給伺服器，首先一百個字元的資料量。For example, for a Unicode string value, could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 如果未明確設定，則會從指定的參數值的實際大小中推斷。If not explicitly set, the size is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter value. 如果大於大小參數值的小數部分，值會被截斷以符合大小。If the fractional part of the parameter value is greater than the size, then the value will be truncated to match the size. 固定長度資料類型的值會被忽略。For fixed length data types, the value of is ignored. 它可以擷取僅供參考之用，並且會傳回的位元組的提供者會使用傳輸伺服器參數的值時的最大數量。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. 如需串流的資訊，請參閱[SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設而不是空字串，參數的值擷取自資料行的任何項目名稱。When is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the name. 如果設`Input`，值取自。If is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the . 如果設`Output`，值取自資料來源。If is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source. A的`InputOutput`是兩者的組合。A of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 如需有關如何使用屬性，請參閱[DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)和[以 Dataadapter 更新資料來源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 設定或取得值，這個值表示來源資料行是否可為 Null。

span.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 這可讓 正確產生可為 Null 的資料行的 Update 陳述式。

span.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果來源資料行可為 Null，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由正確處理可為 null 的資料行時，產生更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 一般而言，使用僅限於開發人員繼承自。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用這個屬性來判斷來源資料行是否可為 null，並將此屬性設定為`true`是否可為 null，和`false`如果不是。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 當會產生其 Update 陳述式，它會檢查每個參數。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果屬性是`true`，會產生類似下面的 WHERE 子句 （在這個查詢運算式中，"FieldName"代表欄位的名稱）：If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果為 false，此欄位為會產生下列 WHERE 子句：If for the field is false, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 此外，@IsNull_FieldName包含 1，如果來源欄位包含 null 和 0 如果不存在。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 這項機制可讓 SQL Server 中的效能最佳化，並提供可跨多個提供者的通用程式碼。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性供`SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`以判斷原始或目前的值是否用於參數值更新期間。This property is used by the `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand` during an update to determine whether the original or current value is used for a parameter value. 這可讓更新的主索引鍵。This lets primary keys be updated. 此屬性設定為版本供`DataRow.Item`屬性，或其中一個`DataRow.GetChildRows`方法物件。This property is set to the version of the used by the `DataRow.Item` property, or one of the `DataRow.GetChildRows` methods of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. value.span: ，為參數的值，使用 SQL 類型。

span.span: An that is the value of the parameter, using SQL types.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入參數的值繫結至傳送到伺服器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 輸出和傳回值參數，在完成設定值及之後已關閉。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 這個屬性可以設定為 null 或。This property can be set to null or . 使用傳送 NULL 值做為參數的值。Use to send a NULL value as the value of the parameter. 使用 null 或未設定来用於參數的預設值。Use null or do not set to use the default value for the parameter. 如果應用程式指定的資料庫型別，繫結的值會轉換成該類型，提供者將資料傳送到伺服器時。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供者會嘗試將值的任何類型的轉換，如果支援介面。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的型別不相容的值，可能導致轉換錯誤。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 同時和屬性可以藉由設定推斷。Both the and properties can be inferred by setting the . 屬性覆寫`SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`。The property is overwritten by `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`. 使用屬性設為 common language runtime (CLR) 型別傳回參數值。Use the property to return parameter values as common language runtime (CLR) types. 如需串流的資訊，請參閱[SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).

.property instance object Value
Public Overrides Property Value As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入參數的值繫結至傳送到伺服器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 輸出和傳回值參數，在完成設定值及之後已關閉。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 這個屬性可以設定為 null 或。This property can be set to null or . 使用傳送 NULL 值做為參數的值。Use to send a NULL value as the value of the parameter. 使用 null 或未設定来用於參數的預設值。Use null or do not set to use the default value for the parameter. 如果非 Unicode XML 資料傳送為字串，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if non-Unicode XML data is passed as a string. 如果應用程式指定的資料庫型別，繫結的值會轉換成該類型，提供者將資料傳送到伺服器時。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供者會嘗試將值的任何類型的轉換，如果支援介面。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的型別不相容的值，可能導致轉換錯誤。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 同時和屬性可用以推斷的值設定。Both the and properties can be inferred by setting the Value. 屬性覆寫`SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`。The property is overwritten by `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`. 如需串流的資訊，請參閱[SqlClient 串流支援](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值為 null (`Nothing`在 Microsoft Visual Basic) 如果在目前資料庫中定義之集合。This value is null (`Nothing` in Microsoft Visual Basic) if the collection is defined within the current database. 它也是 null 是否有任何結構描述集合，在此情況下和也是 null。It is also null if there is no schema collection, in which case and are also null.
